newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil pension funds' assets at $400 bln in 15 yrs.
newsitem.headline: Brazil pension funds' assets at $400 bln in 15 yrs.

text.p: Assets at Brazilian pension funds will total $400 billion in the year 2010, according to estimates by Abrapp, Brazil's association of pension funds, Gazeta Mercantil newspaper said on Thursday.
The estimates are based on forecasts of a 13 percent annual growth in assets in the next 15 years, the newspaper said.
Currently, pension funds' assets total about $65.6 billion.
